column5: Action that SHOULD be taken whenever this test fails.
Human readable description of this preflight test.
Severity of a failure of the test

General area of the preflight test. Values include: Colorspace – Tests that check color space violations. FileFormat – Tests that detect incorrect file format compliancy. Font – Tests that check font integrity. PageFormat – Tests that detect invalid page sizes or page boxes. Resolution – Tests that check low resolution graphics.
Detailed individual parameters of the PreflightTest. The values of GeneralID/ @IDUsage and GeneralID/@IDValue are system dependent.
